means: 使处于中央的控制之下，把…集中于中央( centralize的过去式 )

sentence.Network_en: The economy of the times made it difficult to support centralized rule.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时的经济状况不利于实行集权统治。

sentence.Network_en: a highly centralized system of government
sentence.Network_cn: 高度中央集权的政府体制

sentence.Network_en: "Strong, centralized government" is a term that can cover a multitude of sins.
sentence.Network_cn: “强大的中央集权政府”是一个能掩饰种种问题的措词。

中央 center中央 central中央 centre

entry.tran: 使权力中央化;对…集权控制
entry.def: To centralize a country, state, or organization means to create a system in which one central group of people gives instructions to regional groups.

example.ex: In the mass production era multinational firms tended to centralize their operations...
example.tran: 在大规模生产的时代，跨国公司往往实行集权化经营。

example.ex: The economy of the times made it difficult to support centralized rule.
example.tran: 当时的经济状况不利于实行集权统治。

means.word_mean: 1. drawn toward a center or brought under the control of a central authority;
2. concentrated on or clustered around a central point or purpose

auth_sentence.content: One of those centralized courtyards...enclosed on three sides by the house and on the fourth by a balustrade.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of those centralized courtyards...enclosed on three sides by the house and on the fourth by a balustrade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of those centralized courtyards...enclosed on three sides by the house and on the fourth by a balustrade.

auth_sentence.content: "The global trend is to go for one centralized processor with everyone outsourcing to it, " says FEC chief executive Gregory Pek.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "The global trend is to go for one centralized processor with everyone outsourcing to it, " says FEC chief executive Gregory Pek.

auth_sentence.content: The savings to business comes from not having to build a centralized facility for the service.
auth_sentence.res_content: The savings to business comes from not having to build a centralized facility for the service.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The savings to business comes from not having to build a centralized facility for the service.
